title: Adam & Eve Fonts
content:
Hi Everyone,  
Someone created this sign for my girlfriend a couple of years ago... they are now out of business... Can anyone identify the fonts for Adam and Eve... and also &  
Thank you all in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419132605im_/http:/typophile.com/files/small_font_4516.jpg)
author: kart97

comments.content: 4 years later :) you know it now? i search the same font.

Please use the new place for IDs:
